WorkItem.ClosedComment: Operating as intended: Put a 1f item in your OH and it can more appropriately compare 1h vs 2h
WorkItem.Description:
As soon as ICC Filters are in I plan to always keep Direct Upgrades open on my 2. screen for each boss I'm currently fighting.
 
The only problem I see with Direct Upgrades is that it compares 1H vs. 2H as opposed to 1H+Offhand vs 2H. (Not sure how it handles meta gem requirements, but the 1H vs 2H bugs me a little atm.)
 
Any chance you'd change the way this works?
